sentences.en: Although the European perspective has been instrumental in guiding young democracies out of the grip of authoritarianism and autarchy, this power to transform the fringe is slipping.
sentences.cn: 尽管欧洲一直以来对指引新的民主国家脱离专政与独裁起到了帮助作用，但是，这种能够改变外围的力量正处在不稳定中。

sentences.en: In this thesis, the author believes that the paradox of autarchy and democracy in American politics should not be a new thing only germinating and developing in recent eras.
sentences.cn: 综上所述，本文作者认为，“杰克逊式民主”中表现出的专制与民主的矛盾与共存，是美国政治的传统与根源。

sentences.en: Nowadays many scholars think that the may4th culture conservatism serves for the idea of feudalism returning of the ancients and autarchy culture.
sentences.cn: 在当今学术界，许多学者对五四文化保守主义持批判的态度，认定其是为封建复古主义和专制文化服务的。
